item.title: Quiz: How well do you know Ivo?
item.description:
This is somewhat a remake of a post made in the now non-existent The Great Ivo Blog…

The Quiz

Ivo is a funny guy. How well do you think you know him? Take this quiz and find out! Each correct answer awards you one (1) point, each incorrect answer awards you zero (0). No cheating allowed! I will know.

Question 1

What is Ivo’s favorite animal?

  • Option 1: Turtle
  • Option 2: Chimpanzee
  • Option 3: Cat
  • Option 4: Funny monke
Funny monke. If you guessed chimpanzee, leave. I don't want you in this bolg.

Question number 2

Which Bachelors course does Ivo major in?

item.title: We got comments!
item.description:
Introducing Twikoo

What bolg would this be if it did not have any comment section? A shitty one, that’s what. So one of the first things I’ve worked on after officially publishing this bolg was figure out how to add comments. Guess I succeeded.

Wow, Ivo, that’s so cool! How did you do it?

I’m glad you asked, fellow user. You see, this bolg is powered by Hugo (credited below). It’s a cool framework that just… builds sites for you! Easy to install, especially if you’re on Linux, and it needs few commands to get things done right. It also supports themes. Those are custom layouts built by hardworking people so that lazy folks like me can just take them for their own websites. (This one site’s theme is also credited below.) Well, it seems that this theme integrates the front-end of two comment systems. From what I’ve understood, one of them is paid. As the genius Linus Torvalds once said:

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description:
Hello World!

I guess this is the first real post in this copy of a website. We’ll see if I’ll be able to actually commit to it. Knowing me, likely not. Nonetheless, stay tuned for future updates!

About me

No, I’m not an actual cartoon turtle-looking character.

Anywho, the name’s Ivo. The Amazing Ivo. Remember it well. Welcome to my bolg.

Now, you may be wondering: “Why the hell bolg? Is that a typo? Is it misspelled intentionally? Is there a lore reason for why The Great Ivo is stupid?” Well, allow me to share some brief history on this website. As you may (have) come to learn, I was a student at the totally badass ETH Zurich. Cool place, they gave me a free WordPress blog licence. So one afternoon, while being tormented in class by discrete mathematics, I created The Great Ivo Blog. It was silly, absurd, and relied heavily on pre-made themes. Kind of like this one. So next week I went ahead and showed it to a classmate. He laughed plenty, and we paid no attention to class that morning, and even though he had his own dumb website, he made his own blog. Which he named bolg. This site is in memory of that classmate. May he rest in peace every night when he goes to sleep.

All of the art in this bolg is borrowed (taken without asking). Here are the credits to each image and their respective artists.

  • My profile picture: Pamela Ojeda (@Drawloverlala)
  • The top banner: Hyde (@tabakko)
  • Error 404 page: 森鸟ForestBird

If by the absolute, most minimal, purest chance you are an artist and you do not consent to having your art on this website, please do not hesitate to contact me.
